changeSet.author: larutyunov
changeSet.createView: select pay.id, pay.project_id, pay.date, pay.user_id, pay.payment_category_id, p.employer_id, p.user_group_id, pr.role_id, pay.qty from payment pay inner join project p on pay.project_id = p.id inner join project_role pr on pay.project_id = pr.project_id and pay.user_id = pr.user_id and pay.date between pr.start_date and pr.end_date
